Binding.Expression: [Dashboard Data]
ARRAY_SELECT(EACH [Action], $(i, item) HASH_GET($item, "Action"))

Label.Text: Add reports to your dashboard from a library of pre-defined options.

Block.HeadingText: What report would you like to see

Binding.Expression: AND( [Report Type] = NULL(), [Navigation] = "Reports" )

Label.Text: View and filter tabular reports and export data.

Binding.Expression: HASH_GET([User to Group Mappings], "Administrators") = TRUE
AND( [Report Type] = NULL(), [Navigation] = "Reports" )

LET $numberInRow := 1; LET $data := ARRAY_INDEX([Link and Export Row Data], $numberInRow); LET $title := HASH_GET($data, "Report Name"); LET $url := "TabularReport.aspx?EFormType=" & URLENCODE(HASH_GET($data, "Report EFormType")) & "&profile=" & URLENCODE(HASH_GET($data, "Report Profile Name")); RETURN "" & "
" & "
" & HTMLENCODE($title) & "
" & "
" & "
" & ""

"
"
AND( [Report Type] = NULL(), [Navigation] = "Reports", ARRAY_INDEX([Link and Export Row Data], 1) <> NULL )
AND( [Report Type] = NULL(), [Navigation] = "Reports", ARRAY_INDEX([Link and Export Row Data], 1) = NULL )
AND( [Report Type] = NULL(), [Navigation] = "Reports" )

ChangeFieldValues.Description: Populate Selection Action Data / Clear report type

Navigate.UrlTemplate:
{ IF( HASH_GET([Selected Action Data], "Navigation Type") = "URL", HASH_GET([Selected Action Data], "URL"),
HASH_GET([Selected Action Data], "Navigation Type") = "Existing Record", "records/" & URLENCODE(HASH_GET([Selected Action Data], "EForm Target")) & "/" & URLENCODE(HASH_GET([Selected Action Data], "RecordID")) ) }

FormulaCriterion.Formula: AND( HASH_GET([Selected Action Data], "Open Mode") = "Default", HASH_GET([Selected Action Data], "Navigation Type") = "Existing Record" )
